content.prompt: Which of the following describes Stantonâ€™s argument in the excerpt?

choices.label: Educational opportunities for women should be directed toward preparing them for household labor.
Federal laws should be passed to protect female workers from unsafe conditions in factories.
The inherent natural rights of women should be respected by government and society.
The leaders of the reform movement to prohibit alcohol consumption should be women.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
